connectionString: Data Source = usaxprod; Initial Catalog=DataloadStaging; User id=SSIntUser; Password=SSIntUser
Query: IF EXISTS (SELECT GLAccountNumber FROM [DataloadStaging].[dbo].[RPA_PL_AcctCategoryMap] WHERE [GLAccountNumber] = '{0}' AND [GLAccountName] = '{1}' AND [AccountType] = '{2}' AND [Mapping] = '{3}') BEGIN SELECT 'TRUE' END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [DataloadStaging].[dbo].[RPA_PL_AcctCategoryMap] ([GLAccountNumber],[GLAccountName],[AccountType],[Mapping]) VALUES ('{0}','{1}','{2}','{3}') END
